title: 62: Astrology & Reading Birth Charts with Jessica Lanyadoo
itunes:title: 62: Astrology & Reading Birth Charts with Jessica Lanyadoo
description:
The Broads are joined by the incredible astrologer/psychic medium/podcaster extraordinaire, Jessica Lanyadoo! They chat about what astrology truly is, 101 basics, Jessica reads their birth charts, and The Broads have their minds blown.
Jessica Lanyadoo @jessica_lanyadoo is the resident GirlBoss astrologer, host of TLC's Stargazing and of her podcast "Ghost of a Podcast" @ghostofapodcast.
Chatty Broads is recorded and produced @theblueroommedia www.theblueroommedia.com
***FAB FIT FUN: Check out www.FABFITFUN.com and use the code "CHATTY" so you can save $10 off your first box!
*** BEAUTY BY DESIGN: Use code CHATTY at Beautybydesign.com/chatty for 20% off!
*** MELTDOWN BLEMISH CREAM BY BLUME: text Chatty to 79-79-79 to get 25% off Meltdown Blemish Treatment by Blume and free shipping!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
